related.meaning: buah plum, terendah (dari sistem peringkat tiga tingkat)

lessons.indonesian: The rainy season has set in.

lessons.japanese: 梅雨に入ってしまったね。
lessons.indonesian: The rainy season has set in.
The rainy season has set in.
The rainy season has set in.
The rainy season is near at hand.

lessons.japanese: もう２週間かそこらで梅雨も終わるでしょう。
lessons.indonesian: The rainy season will be over in another two weeks or so.

lessons.japanese: とうとう梅雨が終わったようだ。
lessons.indonesian: It seems that the rainy season is over at last.

lessons.japanese: 明日から梅雨前線が活発になります。
lessons.indonesian: The seasonal rain front is moving in tomorrow.

lessons.japanese: 万一明日梅雨に入ったらどうしよう。
lessons.indonesian: What if the rainy season should set in tomorrow?

lessons.japanese: 梅雨らしく空はどんよりしている。
lessons.indonesian: The sky is gloomy and gray - a typical rainy-season sky.
